name: Nidina Shoulder Plate
description: Broad swooping curves are the essence of the Nidina armor set.

languages.description: Breite Kehrkurven sind die Essenz des Rüstung-Paket: Nidina.
languages.name: Schulterplatten: Nidina

languages.description: De larges courbes descendantes constituent l'essence même de l'Armure Nidina.
languages.name: Épaulières Nidina

languages.description: Le ampie e repentine curve sono l'essenza del set Armatura Nidina.
languages.name: Spallacci Nidina

languages.description: 이 넓게 빠진 곡선이야말로 니디나 아머 세트의 특징입니다.
languages.name: 니디나 숄더 플레이트

languages.description: Anchas curvas que descienden es la esencia del conjunto de armadura Nidina.
languages.name: Hombreras de placas Nidina

languages.description: 宽阔的曲线是尼迪纳护甲套装的精髓。
languages.name: 尼迪纳肩甲

languages.description: Широкие нисходящие изгибы являются отличительной чертой брони Нидина.
languages.name: Наплечник: Нидина

languages.description: 幅の広いキュッとしたカーブ具合がNidinaアーマーセットの要だ。
languages.name: Nidina ショルダープレート

languages.description: Szerokie i zamaszyste krzywe są esencją projektu pancerza Nidina.
languages.name: Naramienniki: Nidina

languages.description: Curvas amplas são a essência do conjunto de Armadura Nidina.
languages.name: Ombros: Nidina

languages.description: 寬闊的曲線是尼迪納護甲套裝的精髓。
languages.name: 尼迪納肩甲

languages.description: ส่วนโค้งเว้ากว้างเป็นหัวใจสำคัญของชุดเกราะ Nidina
languages.name: เพลตไหล่ Nidina

languages.description: Geniş, baskın kıvrımlar Nidina zırh setinin özünü oluşturur.
languages.name: Nidina Omuz Plakası
